sentences.en: a collective decision made by all board members
sentences.cn: 董事会所有成员作出的集体决定

sentences.en: As his ball flew wide, there was a collective groan from the stands.
sentences.cn: 他将球踢飞了，看台上一片叹息声。

sentences.en: Bruce Springsteen has re-hired his muso collective, the E Street Band.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯·斯普林斯汀重新组建了他的音乐团队，E街乐队。

sentences.en: Don't be a discredit to the collective.
He believes AIDS is our collective nemesis.
sentences.cn: 他认为艾滋病是对我们所有人的惩罚。

sentences.en: He will see that he is participating in all the decisions of the collective.
sentences.cn: 他要确保他在参与集体企业的所有决策。

sentences.en: I do feel deeply the strength of the collective.
sentences.cn: 我确实深深地感到了集体的力量.

sentences.en: It was a period of collective insanity, of legalized murder and mayhem.
sentences.cn: 那是个集体丧失理智、谋杀与暴力合法化的时期。

sentences.en: our collective responsibility for the environment
sentences.cn: 我们对环境的共同责任

sentences.en: The collective wealth has been accumulated bit by bit.
sentences.cn: 集体的家业是一点一滴地积攒起来的.

sentences.en: The country's politicians are already heaving a collective sigh of relief.
sentences.cn: 该国的政界人士均已松了口气。

sentences.en: Their collective volume wasn't very large.
They all seem to take an inflated view of their collective identity.
sentences.cn: 他们对自己的集体身份似乎都持有一种夸大的看法.

sentences.en: They hold together for collective security.
sentences.cn: 他们为了共同安全而团结在一起.

sentences.en: They reminded me that one can be strong only when united with the collective.
sentences.cn: 他们使我想到,只有和集体结合才有力量.

sentences.en: This principle of collective bargaining has been a mainstay in labor relations in this country.
sentences.cn: 这一集体谈判原则已经成为该国劳动关系的重要基础。

sentences.en: This sort of activity damages the reputation of the collective.
sentences.cn: 这种行为有损于集体的荣誉.

sentences.en: We all bear collective responsibility for this decision.
sentences.cn: 我们大家共同承担这项决定的责任.

words.tran_cn: 可收集的；可回收的（等于collectable）
收集成地；冷静地，镇定地
采集，聚集；[税收] 征收；收藏品；募捐
收藏家；[电子] 集电极；收税员；征收者
集团化；使集体化；使之成为共同的（等于collectivise）

phrases.tran_cn: 劳资双方代表进行的谈判
集体行为；集合行为；集群行为

trans.tran_en: shared or made by every member of a group or society
a group of people who work together to run something such as a business or farm, and who share the profits equally
